Name: rngsubtype
Description: OID of the element type (subtype) of this range type

Name: rngmultitypid
Description: OID of the multirange type for this range type

Name: rngcollation
Description: OID of the collation used for range comparisons, or zero if none

Name: rngsubopc
Description: OID of the subtype's operator class used for range comparisons

Name: rngcanonical
Description: OID of the function to convert a range value into canonical form, or zero if none

Name: rngsubdiff
Description: OID of the function to return the difference between two element values as double precision, or zero if none
